column5: AWSOME DAY ON THE WATER TODAY!!! MUST OF HAD A REAL GOOD SOUTH WIND LAST NIGHT CAUSE IT SURE STIRRED THE LAKE UP WELL!! HAD ABOUT 4" OF VIS!!! IT WAS LIKE OPENING DAY FOR ME!!! I GOT SOOOO MANY FISH I ACTUALLY RAN OUT OF ROE!!! NOW THE BAD NEWS!! MY 13FT 2PC IM8 IS NOW A 3PC   LOL WAS FIGHTIN A BIG FISH AND PUTTIN LOADS OF PRESSURE ON WHEN HE SPIT THE HOOK MY ROD CAME WHIPPIN BACK AND WHACK RIGHT ON THE ROCK!!! SO I FISHED THE REST OF THE DAY WITH 12' 2" LOL ONLY GOT 4 PICS IN THEN THE BATTERY DIES IN THE CAM  LOL  CAUGHT 20 + ON THE CHROME AND A APPROX 15LB BROWN MALE!!!  SURE WISH I WAS GOIN BACK TOMOR BUT ITS BACK TO BEIN MR MOM FOR 4 DAYS(WIFE WORKIN  LOL) OHH WELL MONSTER TRUCKS ON SUNDAY!!!
nice job! too bad about the rod though
sweet fish CC, real nice chrome
Howza 'bout some scenery shots with those fish pics so we can come ravish your fishin' hole while you play Mr. Mom for the next 4 days???  Just kiddin', nice fish!

Nice CC. Too bad about your rod. I know those rod are exspensive. Must have been a real monster the one that got away. A fishing net? Don't recall seeing you even use a net before?  Or is it something I missed?   dsn
TX GUYZ!!! A NET IS A MUST ON THE PIER  LOL LAST THING YA WANNA DO IS GO FOR A SWIM THIS TIME OF YR  LOL

ouch..I have anxiety with landing pier fish with nets.  Leaves ya responsible for hitting the net man between the eyes too...  Did the same thing on Wed., holding the rod sideways guiding the fish into the net, rip, smack off a rock.   Have a sweet perch ice blank atleast.  R.I.P - Cormor 13fter.  1998- 2007  Best damn winter long rod.
Very nice indeed!

Awesome CC!  I wish I could fish during the daylight...LOL.  I saw a float in one of your pics....does bottom fishing work too?  I'm assuming since the tribs...at least the smaller ones are low and clear that they are hanging around structure near the trib mouth...I'll have to try that this weekend maybe...
Always amazing shots, Scott. I'd recognize that net anywhere.
thankz guyz!!  ccmt yes bottom fishing works well too!!! just make sure ya got cleats before ya venture out on a pier!!! slippery indeed!!

Thanks CC...how much do you charge for lessons?? LOL.  I'd seriously like to hook up with you some time....as long as your not heading out to your secret spots etc.  I wont even put my line in the water...I'll just watch the master at work!!!!  I have yet to land a steelie....tried local tribs about 7 times....had one on...and that was it...hehe.  Great stuff...always love reading your reports.

BEST TIME IS DURIN THE WEEK FOR ME !!! ODD WEEKEND!!! I KNOW ITS TUFF FOR MOST BUT IM LUCKY ENOUGH TO GET THE WINTERS OFF!!! YOUR MORE THEN WELCOME TO COME ALONG ANYTIME BRO!!!JUST PM ME A DAY AND IF IM FREE WERE OFF!! LESSONS WORK LIKE THIS 1/2 DAY  LARGE 2 MILK 2 SWEETENER FULLDAY X-LARGE 2 MILK 2 SWEETENER AND A BEGAL ADD SOME LANDED FISH      ON THE HOUSE!!!!
PM sent!
Nice report and fish CC. I figured the tribs would be froze up by now. Might have to give it another go sometime next week. Supposed to get rain on thursday. Again nice report!
tribs are froze bro!!! pier  lol
Oops I guess I missed the "Pier".
NIce fish, sorry about the rod.
guess were in the same boat with the broken rod
Nice fish Bro W2G   jordan
WAY TO GO CC,I DIDNT THINK THERE WOULD BE ANY TROUT LEFT BY NOW,I THOUGHT THAT YOU CAUGHT ALL OF THEM BY NOW..LOL....   cheers bud
awesome! thanks for the report, sound slike a hella fine day.
